name: Identification and Authentication (Non-Organizational Users)
description: Uniquely identify and authenticate non-organizational users or processes acting on behalf of non-organizational users.
supplemental_guidance: Non-organizational users include system users other than organizational users explicitly covered by IA-02. Non-organizational users are uniquely identified and authenticated for accesses other than those explicitly identified and documented in AC-14. Identification and authentication of non-organizational users accessing federal systems may be required to protect federal, proprietary, or privacy-related information.
